channel.title: Artworks on Juan-Pablo Villegas
channel.description: Recent content in Artworks on Juan-Pablo Villegas

item.title: Moneda
item.description: I acquired an archive of 8 mm films and 35 mm slides (about 30 kg of this material), consisting of images of archaeological prehispanic ruins and colonial buildings from various places in Mexico that had previously been used to illustrate various classes at the National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM). I worked to extract the silver contained in the film in the form of silver nitrate, using different chemical processes.

item.title: Fe
item.description: Opaco consiste en el montaje de audios recuperados de distintas películas de suspenso, ciencia ficción y terror donde el encuentro con la otredad es considerado como algo que pone en riesgo los límites de la identidad física y mental.
